title: How to SSH into a PC inside campus from outside
text:
The default port for SSH is blocked in the campus and it forces one to use a lot of workarounds to do simple SSH tasks; one such task is exposing a PC inside campus network for SSH by a PC outside the campus network.
I recently had to do the hardwork and the attached article shows the steps I used for the same. This will be based on Debian (and Ubuntu) but the steps, more or less remain the same throughout.
Read more on the same here: https://thealphadollar.github.io/tech/2019/07/17/ssh_from_outside.html
